html.head:
Welcome,
This test consists of 61 items. You must have a score of 64% or above to pass. You have a total of 100 minutes to completethe NDA, Survey, and Exam.

select.label: Which kind of ColdFusion data can be serialized into the JSON format with the serializaJSON() function?

select.span: The following CFM page named input.cfm receives a URL variable and returns its value in upper case.
select.label: Which cfdiv tag uses the correct binding expression to pass the value of a cfinput control named myInput and display the value returned from the first page?

select.span: You are using cfajaxproxy to retrieve data asynchronously from a CFC function on the server.
select.label: Which data format is used to send back the data response?
What is the correct value of the cffunction tag's access attribute for CFC functions that you want to expose over the Web using SOAP or Flash Remoting?

select.span: You have created a ColdFusion component in your application. Inside that component you need to create a property called user that CANNOT be seen outside the component.
select.label: Which definition creates a user variable that CANNOT be accessed outside the component?

select.span: A CFC file named MyComponent.cfc is stored in the cfc subfolder of the web server's document root folder.
select.label: Which cfscript statement correctly creates an instance of the CFC?
In which situations will ColdFusion validate data types defined by the cfproperty tag? (Choose two)
select.option: calls to CFC functions from a CFM page
calls to CFC functions from SOAP-based web service clients
calls to CFC functions from another CFC function
when CFC documentation has been generated
calls to CFC functions from a Flex or Flash-based client over Flash Remoting

select.label: Which value is returned from function f1?

select.span: You want to create a ColdFusion component that contains mathematics methods, and can be accessed directly by a form post. You Web root directory is C:\coldfucion9\wwwroot
select.label: Which filename should you use?
Which attribute is used in a component definition to create an inheritance relationship with a super or base component?
What are two valid locations in which to place a CFC file on the server disk so its functions can be called from CFM pages in a ColdFusion application? (Choose two)
select.option: within a folder named cfc under the WEB-INF folder
within a folder named cfc under the ColdFusion instalation folder
within the web server's document root folder structure

select.span: You application utilizes ColdFusion components organized into folders. The User.cfc file is stored in the vo folder inside the app directory of your webroot.
select.label: Which tag instantiates the User.cfc and stores it in the myuser variable?
What is the correct prefix for addressing files stored in server memory?

select.span: A file name data.txt is stored in the same directory as the currently executing CFM page.
select.label: What is the correct sintax to read the contents of the file into a variable named content?
What is the correct sintax for creating a new directory named subfolder under the directory containing the currently executing code?
